synopsis.text: The narrative revolves around a young, talented cow herder who possesses an uncanny knack for playing the flute. His constant companion is a devoted water buffalo. Haunted by a dream where he loses his buffalo, the boy's worst fears seem to come true when the buffalo refuses to budge from its hiding spot. In a bid to reunite with his beloved companion, the boy employs his flute-playing skills, crafting a melody that successfully draws the buffalo back to his side.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
